Notes: A red ring that causes the player to gain a short speed boost when entered while swimming or flying with the Flying power-up.

Obj_arg0.Name: Boost Time
Obj_arg0.Description: The time in frames for how long the boost will be active. Default is 300.

Obj_arg1.Name: Acceleration Time
Obj_arg1.Description: The time in frames it takes to reach the maximum boost. Default is 120.

Obj_arg2.Name: Speed Boost
Obj_arg2.Description: Speed boost multiplied by 100. Default is 250.

Obj_arg3.Name: Turn to Player?
Obj_arg3.Description: If set, the ring will always rotate towards the player.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: The object will become visible and resume movement hwhen this switch is activated.
